Reviews.Title: “Appalling value, dismal customer service, "breakfast" is beyond a joke. Avoid at all costs.”

Reviews.Content: paid 500 3 nights park savoy hotel including breakfast – bought hotel’s own website arrived hotel staff indifferent smiled hello dingy fantastic scenic views scaffolding window wedged accommodate air conditioning machine gap window taped cardboard gaffer tape pure quality room” 6th floor actually hotel’s single bedrooms table croissants bagels muffins coffee tea hawk staff policing customers rudely telling dared bagel muffin croissant looked eat breakfast quickly transpired actually expected bedroom paper plate enjoy wonderful views scaffolding complaining hotel concept received rude emails hotel staff comprehend service 500 3 nights especially breakfast shockingly poor value land customer service recommend hotel appalling value dismal customer service avoid costs
